advancedQueries.query:
avg((redis_uptime_in_seconds{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

avg((redis_mem_fragmentation_ratio{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

time() - avg((redis_rdb_last_save_timestamp_seconds{} * on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

avg(100 * (rate(redis_keyspace_hits_total{}[$__interval])   / (rate(redis_keyspace_misses_total{}[$__interval]) + rate(redis_keyspace_hits_total{}[$__interval])) 
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

sum((redis_pubsub_channels{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

sum((redis_connected_slaves{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

avg((100 * (redis_connected_clients{} / redis_config_maxclients{})
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

max((redis_rdb_changes_since_last_save{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

avg((100 * sum by(container_id, host_mac) (rate(redis_evicted_keys_total{}[$__interval]) )  / sum by (container_id, host_mac) (redis_db_keys{}) * on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

sum((redis_pubsub_patterns{}
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet})

((sum by(container_id, host_mac) (rate(redis_commands_duration_seconds_total{}[$__interval])) / sum by (container_id, host_mac)(rate(redis_commands_processed_total{}[$__interval])))
* on (container_id, host_mac) group_left(cluster,namespace,pod) sysdig_container_info{cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace}) * on (pod) group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{owner_kind="ReplicaSet",cluster=~$cluster,namespace=~$namespace,owner_name=~$replicaSet}
